title: Pixel 3a, Android 11, AirPods = no sound at all
content:
AirPods are working when connected to iPhone. Also work on iPad and cheap Chinese BT adaptor plugged into analog out of old laptop.
Airpods will connect to BT on Pixel 3a, and an audible tone is heard after making the connection
Phone app - no sound (though the phone thinks it’s connected to the AirPods. If I change to speaker the phone works as normal)
No sound in a media app like YouTube or Duolingo
Checked all AirPods are expecting to take all types of sounds (media, phone, notifications etc) in BT settings
Un-paired and re-paired x4
Re-booted x2
No change - same symptoms 

Same airpods *did* work 3 months ago when the phone was running Android 10
C’mon Google don’t you test this stuff even on your own phones?
